# 网页秀

创建网页截图，并展示在网页上。

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(httr)

# 读取数据
data <- read_csv("github_issue_comments.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

# 转换时间格式
data$time <- ymd_hms(data$time)

data <- data |> 
  mutate(likes = 0)

# 排序数据
sorted_data <- data %>%
  arrange(time) # 默认按时间排序

# 生成截图列表 HTML
generate_screenshot_list <- function(data) {
  screenshot_list <- lapply(1:nrow(data), function(i) {
    item <- data[i, ]
    htmltools::tags$div(
     htmltools::tags$a(htmltools::tags$b(item$author, herf = item$content_url)),
      if (!is.null(item$link)) {
        htmltools::tags$a(
          href = item$link,
          if (!is.null(item$screenshot_path[[1]])) {
            path = paste0("www/", item$screenshot_path[[1]])
            htmltools::tags$img(src = path, alt = item$content)
          }
        )
      },
      class = "grid-item"
    )
  })
  htmltools::tagList(screenshot_list)
}

screenshot_list_html <- generate_screenshot_list(sorted_data)
```

```{=html}
<style>
  .grid-container {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
    grid-auto-rows: 300px;
    grid-gap: 10px;
    justify-content: center;
    margin-top: 5em;
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 5em auto 0 auto;
  }
  .grid-item {
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
    padding: 10px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  .grid-item img {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    object-fit: cover;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease; /* 添加过渡效果 */
  }
  .grid-item img:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05); /* 鼠标悬停时放大图片 */
  }
  .grid-item h4 a {
    text-decoration: none; /* 移除默认下划线 */
    color: #333; /* 设置字体颜色 */
    font-weight: 600; /* 设置字体粗细 */
    transition: color 0.3s ease; /* 添加颜色过渡效果 */
  }
  .grid-item h4 a:hover {
    color: #007bff; /* 鼠标悬停时改变字体颜色 */
    margin-top: 0; /* 移除默认的外边距 */
    margin-bottom: 1em; /* 添加底部外边距 */
  }
  .floating-title {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
    padding: 1px;
    text-align: center;
    z-index: 1000;
  }
</style>

<div class="grid-container">
  `r as.character(screenshot_list_html)`
</div>
```
